original: Aria Steelwind attacked von Sanctus with a Fire Bolt in the Common Room. He reacted by casting Force Cage to protect himself. Seeing that she couldn’t break through it, she started a fire to eat all of the oxygen in the room. Von Sanctus was probably helpless as he suffocated from a lack of oxygen.
translation: 在公共休息室，阿莉亚·斯蒂尔文德用火焰箭攻击了冯·桑克图斯。冯·桑克图斯尝试使用坚牢术自保。发现无法突破法术之后，阿莉亚纵火燃尽了室内氧气。冯·桑克图斯只能无助地因缺氧而窒息身亡。
